entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS AROUND 50
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS AROUND 80
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
